P.S. I didn't know where this should go since it was made by riot . Plz dont delete if you do move it to the appropriate board if this isn't the right one ty <3

replies.body: I broke my computer trying to shove my wallet through... :(

Wait.

Hold on.

***THIS IS REAL???***

I came into this thread like "yeah that's a great idea, I hope to-----whaaaaaaat"

These skins are ***AMAZING***.  My god, even the Orianna ball is the cutest thing ever.

I just can't even handle that Orianna ball, the more I look at it.  The tiny horns and little propeller just make me giggle every time.

Yep: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/11/1119-pbe-update.html#more


There's even a Malz Skin where he's got a little Voidling-Poro, and 6 Poro icons (No idea how to get those, though).
Petition to rename Winter Wonder Orianna, to Pororianna

> Petition to rename Winter Wonder Orianna, to Pororianna

Seconded.
Poro Orianna hits me right in the feels for some reason.

> Poro Orianna hits me right in the feels for some reason.

have you watched frozen recently?

Like I said in another thread, that skin alone is probably going to double the amount of Sejuani players.

YMMV if that's a good thing or a bad thing.

EDIT: Also she's swinging around a huge Poro Snax {{item:2052}}  (Snak? What's the singular of Snax?) Either way, it's a nice touch.
I can't wait for the ori skin.  =3

But I already have Bear Calvary Sejuani...

My wallet can't handle the poros...

I feel like I've seen that poro before.
Maybe it was that one game on Howling Abyss when we got all ten people to feed the same poro.
You forgot Snow Day Malzahar, AKA Poro Master Malzahar.

> You forgot Snow Day Malzahar, AKA Poro Master Malzahar.

Nah i didn't count him cause its only his voidlings which you dont see that often
YES NEW SEJ SKIN!!! and its with PORO'S!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
